title: Upper-Intermediate English 405
headline: This free online English course improves your grammar and reading skills and explains how to discuss role models.
description: This English course provides vocabulary related to role models and their traits for those wanting to improve their English. After learning useful new phrases, you will use them in sentences to master grammar topics such as future continuous and future perfect tense and phrasal verbs to enhance your abilities. We recommend this course for anyone who wants to learn English and build confidence while speaking and writing in this global language.
courseDescription:
This English course begins by expanding your vocabulary about role models and their positive and negative characteristics. You will be able to read articles, watch videos and listen to audio clips related to the vocabulary and grammar sections, which will help you become more proficient in the English language.

The first grammar topic is a short review of the future continuous tense and the use of 'will.' We then introduce you to the 'be' sentence construction and compare it to its future tense 'be going to' counterpart. Our second grammar lesson examines the positive and negative forms of future perfect tense and explains how to use them to form questions.

The last section of this course offers an opportunity to practice your reading, speaking, and writing skills to help you become more fluent in English. You will also learn new words that you will be able to speak to discuss role models and the positive and negative terminology related to them. You can download a writing assignment from our 'Resources' section to try out your newfound skills. Sign up today to continue your progress in this international language.
